xxl.core.indexStructures

Class MVBTree.NodeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.converters.Converter
      • xxl.core.indexStructures.BPlusTree.NodeConverter
        • xxl.core.indexStructures.MVBTree.NodeConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    MVBTree

    public class MVBTree.NodeConverter
extends BPlusTree.NodeConverter
    This Converter is concerned with serializing of nodes to write or read them into or from the external storage.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Computes the maximal size (in bytes) of a record (IndexEntry or data object).

      • indexEntrySize

        protected int indexEntrySize()
        Description copied from class: BPlusTree.NodeConverter
        Computes the maximal size (in bytes) of an IndexEntry. It calls the method getIdSize() of the tree container. If the tree container has not been initialized a NullPointerException is thrown.
        Overrides:
        indexEntrySize in class BPlusTree.NodeConverter
        Returns:
        the maximal size of an IndexEntry

      • leafEntrySize

        protected int leafEntrySize()
        Overrides:
        leafEntrySize in class BPlusTree.NodeConverter

      • getMaxRecordSize

        public int getMaxRecordSize()
        Computes the maximal size (in bytes) of a record (IndexEntry or data object). It calls the method getIdSize() of the tree container. If the tree container has not been initialized a NullPointerException is thrown.
        Returns:
        the maximal size of a record (IndexEntry or data object)
